/*
* {
	font-family:Verdana;
}
*/
BODY {
	margin:0px;
}

._chromeTable,
._tocTable {
	width:100%;
}

._page {}

._headerContainer {
	Xheight:30px;
}

._breadcrumbHeader,
._logoHeader,
._titleHeader {
	background-color:#eeeeee;
}

._logoHeader {
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;	
}

._breadcrumbHeader {
	padding-top:2px;
	height:10px;	
}

._titleHeader {
	padding-top:2px;
	height:10px;
	padding-bottom:5px;
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
}


._footerContainer {
	height:15px;
	border-top:1px solid #cccccc;
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
}

._sideBarContainer {
	Xwidth:150px;
	background-color:#eeeeee;
	border-right:1px solid #cccccc;
}

._titleBarContainer {
	
}

._contentContainer {
	padding:5px;
	padding-bottom:20px;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
}

._pageName {
	white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden;
	font-size:18px;
	font-weight:bold;
	vertical-align:bottom;
}

._author {
	white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden;
	padding-left:10px;
	padding-right:5px;
	padding-bottom:2px;
	vertical-align:bottom;
	font-size:9px;
	color:#666666;
}

._history {
	text-align:right;
	white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden;
	padding-right:5px;
	font-size:9px;
	color:#999999;
}


/* Use the following to make links have a small, gray appearance when not rolled over */
._smallGrayLinks A,
._smallGrayLinks span.Object {
	font-size:9px;
	color:#999999;
}
._smallGrayLinks span.Object-activated {
	font-size:9px;
	color:#666666;
}

._copyright {
	white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden;
	font-size:9px;
	color:#999999;
}


._tags {
	text-align:right;
	font-size:9px;
}


._breadcrumbs {
	font-size:9px;		
}

._breadCrumbSeparator {
	padding-left:3px;
	padding-right:3px;
	font-size:9px;	
	color:#999999;
}


/* container for the entire TOC */
._toc {
	margin:10px;	
	border:1px solid #cccccc;
}

._tocTable {
	width:100%
	padding:5px;	
}

._tocHeader {
	background-color:#eeeeee;
	font-size:13px;
	font-weight:bold;
}

._tocLineSeparator {
	border-top:1px dotted #cccccc;
}


._tocPageInfo {
	font-size:9px;
	color:#999999;
}

._tocFragment{
	font-size:9px;
	color:#999999;
}




._pageLink {
	font-size:9px;	
	cursor:pointer;
}

._tag {
	font-size:9px;
	color:darkblue;
	padding-right:10px;
}

._pageIcon {
	width:16;
	padding-left:3px;
	Xpadding-right:3px;
	cursor:pointer;
}

._attachments {
	white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden;
	font-size:11px;
	cursor:pointer;
}


.ImgPage,
.ImgNotebook,
.ImgSection {
	width:16; height:16;
}
